subject: Update CLAUDE.md to reflect current architecture
body:
- Update architecture diagram to show Embedded Wallet SDK and Supabase Edge Functions
- Fix technology stack to reference @fireblocks/embedded-wallet-sdk
- Update application structure to match actual directory layout
- Remove VITE_USE_EMBEDDED_WALLET_SDK from env vars (no longer used)
- Add push notification env vars documentation

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
title: Update CLAUDE.md to reflect current architecture
